title: Quaker's Walk Devizes Route

images.title: Chris Heaton / Quakers' Walk
images.caption: Tree lined path. An avenue of trees guard this footpath that leads from the Kennet and Avon Canal in Devizes towards Roundway. It has also been adapted by the Wessex Ridgeway.

images.title: Chris Heaton / Path to Roundway
images.caption: Path to Roundway. Wessex Ridgeway crossing a field before ascending Roundway Hill. The Millennium White Horse can be seen on the escarpment ahead.

images.title: 2012 : Quakers' Walk, Devizes by Maurice Pullin, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: A spring view of the trail.

images.title: Kennet & Avon Canal, Devizes by Stephen McKay, CC BY-SA 2.0 <https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/2.0>, via Wikimedia Commons
images.caption: Kennet & Avon Canal, Devizes

description: This nice tree lined bridleway in Devizes makes for a nice easy afternoon stroll. The pleasant path runs for about a mile from the canal to Roundway, using a section of the Wessex Ridgeway Trail. The historic path is believed to go back more than 700 years to the reign of King Edward I. The walk starts on the canal by the Grade II listed Gates and Lodge which originally marked the southern end of Lord Roundway's estate. You then follow the path north for about a mile, finishing at Roundway. You can extend the walk by continuing along the long distance trail to Roundway Hill, the site of a famous Civil War battle where a Royalist cavalry force under Lord Wilmot won a crushing victory over the Parliamentarians in 1643. You can also try the Devizes and Caen Hill Locks walk along the Kennet and Avon Canal.

details.subtitle: Pubs/Cafes
details.content: The Hourglass is in a lovely location right next to the canal in Devizes. From the terrace garden there are lovely views over the water to the surrounding countryside. It's a great place to relax and watch the boats go by on warm summer days. They have an excellent menu and can be found at Horton Avenue with a postcode of SN10 2RH.

display_address: Quakers Lodge, New Park Road, Devizes, Wiltshire, England, SN10 2DJ, United Kingdom
